name: Rusted knight's armor
desc: A set of rusted armor, is not durable.

name: Bronze helmet
desc: A Bronze helmet that can keep you away from a concussion

desc: Most traveler love this round shield

desc: The ultimate knight's armor set, no one can destroy it yet.
